jobs.title: Senior Product Manager

You will collaborate with engineering, design, and business teams to deliver impactful software products for millions of global users. Strong leadership, stakeholder management, and technical understanding are essential.

company.name: Microsoft

jobs.title: Software Engineer

You will be part of a collaborative team building next-gen products using advanced algorithms, AI, and cloud technologies. We value innovation, clean code, and a passion for solving complex technical challenges.

company.name: Google

jobs.title: Backend Engineer
